title: Workshop on Applying Design Principles for Extension Education Faculty

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Developing Basic Educational Materials
context.additional_context: Extended education faculty requiring improved ability to apply visual design principles when developing mathematics education materials.

learning_goals: Participants can create mathematics worksheets applying three core design principles (visual hierarchy, consistency, readability) when designing educational materials.
Participants can utilize a self-checklist for evaluating the visual effectiveness of educational materials with 80% accuracy.
Participants can propose design improvements based on peer feedback at least twice.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
